Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.connection

Class SocketCSConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.connection.CSConnection
it.polimi.ingsw.server.connection.SocketCSConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class SocketCSConnection extends CSConnection implements Runnable
Represent Socket connection. Here all the methods useful for Socket technology.

    • readStreamFromClient

      public void readStreamFromClient() throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException, InterruptedException
      This method reads and reacts to client's messages, also deserializing them.
      Throws:
      IOException - error during stream reading.
      ClassNotFoundException - error during stream reading.
      InterruptedException

    • ping

      public void ping()
      Send a ping message to clients, to know if they are still connected. Otherwise, puts the client in standby, waiting for reconnection
      Specified by:
      ping in class CSConnection

    • run

      public void run()
      This method constantly calls the readStreamFromClient() method to read client's messages.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
